#summary Page outlining how to get GRAF running for potential clients

= Quick Start Guide =

In order to obtain a copy of all the files needed to run and use GRAF version control client will be needed to extract these off the Google code repository. A useful svn client used by some of the team members is tortoise svn which can be found here: 
 * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/tortoisesvn/files/Application/1.6.10/TortoiseSVN-1.6.10.19898-win32-svn-1.6.12.msi/download TortoiseSVN]
